message: I got sick of looking up the strftime directives, so I built stamp. I'd love feedback! https://github.com/jeremyw/stamp
that's quite an interesting approach, I'll test the gem in the near future
Ok that is awesome. strftime is for strfchumps
This is a great idea. I like turtles too. How about support for ordinals? e.g. "May 29th"
Thanks for the positive feedback, folks. I hope you get a chance to try it out in a project.
